item.title: Zhuang Xu
item.description: Research Interests: Cell and Develpment Biology Phosphate utilization and hemostasis in rice Microbiome, colonization of the root microbiome Education: 2020 - Present, PhD in Plant Nutrition, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science MSc in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, Zhejiang Normal University BE in Bioengineering,HuaZhong Agricultural University Contact: Email: 631083028@qq.
